MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Color Syntax Highlighting for additional languages, enhanced CUA-style block marking, backup file enhancement, Wheel Mouse, Fonts, enhanced printing, undo/redo, browse-mode, many new macro language commands, enhanced user-interface files

English.Keywords: editor, text editor, windows text editor, text manipulation, SemWare, regular expressions, color syntax highlighting, macros, scripts, column blocks, programming, data
English.Char_Desc_45: TSE Pro v4.4 full-featured text editor.
English.Char_Desc_80: TSE Pro v4.4 full-featured text editor for Windows, all in a small package.
English.Char_Desc_250: TSE Pro v4.4 for Windows. Compact, fully-featured text editor. Undo/Redo; Multiple files/windows; color syntax hiliting; regular expression search/replace; macro programming language; configurable menus/keyboard/commands; column blocks; much more!
English.Char_Desc_450: TSE Pro v4.4 for Windows. Compact, fully-featured text editor. Undo/Redo; Multiple files/windows; color syntax hiliting; regular expression search/replace; incremental search; macro programming language; configurable menus/keyboard/commands; column blocks; multi-language compiler support; bookmarks; templates; sort; compare files; spelling checker; compressed view; and much more! Ideal for anyone that needs to manipulate text.
English.Char_Desc_2000: The SemWare Editor Professional (TSE Pro) v4.4 for Windows (9x/Me/NT/2000/XP or greater) is a compact, fully-featured text editor that is ideal for programmers, for users needing to manipulate data files (both large and small), as well as anyone needing a fast, powerful, general purpose text editor. Load as many files (long filenames supported) as Window's virtual memory will allow. Files may be loaded in normal text mode or in binary mode (great for editing/viewing non-ASCII files), and additionally offers a HEX mode view, which can be toggled on/off for each file. Use the editor's video macro to adjust the size of the editor's display on the Windows desktop, choosing one of the predefined window sizes, a custom defined size, or choose to use the maximum columns/rows of Windows desktop. Some of the many features of the editor include: Powerful macro programming language (over 500+ commands, including the ability to call DLLs) with debugger; multi-language compiler support; load and/or execute macros from within the editor, or from the command line; configurable menus/keyboard; block marking operations (includes column, character, and line based blocks); regular expression search/replace; color syntax highlighting; spelling checker; pop-up ASCII chart; Windows clipboard support (in addition to editor's internal clipboard); interactive configuration; context-sensitive help system; GUI interface and more! Other key features - Wheel Mouse support; Font selection; Enhanced printing; Multilevel Undo/Redo; option to search subdirectories for matching files when loading or selecting files; search external files for a string; dynamic visual brace match; Browse mode for Read-Only viewing of files; Handy startup menu option; Multiple user-interface files, featuring common windows key assignments; New for this release - Single-instance option; Transparent mode option; Editor-on-top option; 30+ new macro language commands/variables and command enhancements.

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions:
DISTRIBUTION, COPYING RESTRICTIONS
Individuals are granted a limited license to copy the Test-Drive Software only for the trial use of other individuals in accordance with the limitations identified in this License, and subject to the following restrictions:
1. You MAY NOT distribute the Software in connection with any other product or service.
2. You MAY NOT make general use of the Software within a company, institution, or agency.
3. You MAY NOT copy or distribute the Software for any consideration or 'disk fee'.
4. You MAY NOT copy or distribute the Software in modified form. (Any distribution must include ALL FILES supplied by SemWare with the Test-Drive version of The SemWare Editor Professional, WITHOUT ALTERATION.)
5. You MAY NOT distribute the Software documentation, in whole or in part, in printed form.
Operators of ftp sites, WWW sites, or electronic bulletin board systems (Sysops) are permitted and encouraged to post the Test-Drive version of the Software for downloading by their users, as long as the above conditions are met. Though a fee may be charged for access, NO FEE may be charged to specifically access or download the TSE Pro Test-Drive files.
Non-profit computer-related User Groups may distribute the Test-Drive version of the Software provided the above conditions are met. However, such User Groups MAY charge a NOMINAL fee to cover the cost of the disk and copying of the Software.
Disk vendors MUST obtain written permission from SemWare before distributing the Test-Drive version of the Software. Certain restrictions apply.
Permissions.EULA:
Test-Drive Software License
THE SEMWARE EDITOR PROFESSIONAL TEST-DRIVE SOFTWARE LICENSE
This version of The SemWare Editor Professional (the 'Software') is NOT public domain or free software, but is being distributed in 'Test-Drive' form for EVALUATION PURPOSES ONLY. Your use of this Software indicates your agreement to the terms and conditions of this License.
COPYRIGHT, PROPRIETARY RIGHTS
The SemWare Editor Professional (TSE Pro) Software is owned by SemWare Corporation or its suppliers and is protected by United States copyright laws and international treaty provisions. You may not reverse engineer, decompile, disassemble, or create derivative works based on the Software for any purpose other than creating an adaptation to the Software as an essential step in its utilization for your own use. This Software embodies valuable trade secrets proprietary to SemWare; you may not disclose any information regarding the internal operations of this Software to others.
USAGE RESTRICTIONS
SemWare grants a limited license to individuals to use this Test-Drive Software for a 60-day evaluation period on a private, non-commercial basis, for the express purpose of determining whether TSE Pro is suitable for their needs. At the end of this 60-day evaluation period, the individual must either purchase a license from SemWare for continued use of the Software, or discontinue using TSE Pro.
Licensed users receive the latest, fully-functioning version of the Software (that does NOT show the opening and closing reminder screens); printed documentation; source code for numerous macros; additional utilities and configuration files. Purchasing a license to use the Software also entitles the licensed user to receive technical support (by phone, fax, mail, or various electronic services such as CompuServe or InterNet), and makes them eligible for discounts on future versions.
This Test-Drive version of the Software is not intended for use on a network or multi-user system. However, SemWare does offer licensing of a network/multi-user version of the fully-functioning Software; please contact SemWare for details.
DISTRIBUTION, COPYING RESTRICTIONS
Individuals are granted a limited license to copy the Test-Drive Software only for the trial use of other individuals in accordance with the limitations identified in this License, and subject to the following restrictions:
1. You MAY NOT distribute the Software in connection with any other product or service.
2. You MAY NOT make general use of the Software within a company, institution, or agency.
3. You MAY NOT copy or distribute the Software for any consideration or 'disk fee'.
4. You MAY NOT copy or distribute the Software in modified form. (Any distribution must include ALL FILES supplied by SemWare with the Test-Drive version of The SemWare Editor Professional, WITHOUT ALTERATION.)
5. You MAY NOT distribute the Software documentation, in whole or in part, in printed form.
Operators of ftp sites, WWW sites, or electronic bulletin board systems (Sysops) are permitted and encouraged to post the Test-Drive version of the Software for downloading by their users, as long as the above conditions are met. Though a fee may be charged for access, NO FEE may be charged to specifically access or download the TSE Pro Test-Drive files.
Non-profit computer-related User Groups may distribute the Test-Drive version of the Software provided the above conditions are met. However, such User Groups MAY charge a NOMINAL fee to cover the cost of the disk and copying of the Software.
Disk vendors MUST obtain written permission from SemWare before distributing the Test-Drive version of the Software. Certain restrictions apply.

SEMWARE PROVIDES THE TEST-DRIVE VERSION OF THE SEMWARE EDITOR PROFESSIONAL 'AS IS' AND WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY. TO THE EXTENT PERMITTED UNDER APPLICABLE LAW, SEMWARE DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO, ANY IMPLIED WARRANTY OF MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. SPECIFICALLY, SEMWARE MAKES NO REPRESENTATION OR WARRANTY THAT THE SOFTWARE IS FIT FOR ANY PARTICULAR PURPOSE.

If you are acquiring the Software on behalf of any unit or agency of the United States Government, the following provisions apply:
